metadata.title: CVE-2019-14831 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Moodle 3.7 to 3.7.1, 3.6 to 3.6.5, 3.5 to3.5.7 and earlier unsupported versions, where forum subscribe linkcontained an open redirect if forced subscription mode was enabled. If aforum's subscription mode was set to "forced subscription", the forum'ssubscribe link contained an open redirect.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
